channel.title: Game Crashing Today
channel.description: Anybody else having problems with the game crashing today? Never happened to me before today. Now 2 times within the last couple hours it crashed at the same moment in the game. Game starts, i open my journal and write my name and class, D1 turns to N1, and then my sword curser turns into that blue spinning loading curser and nothing happens until i close the games window and it says the program isn't repsonding. First time i was a drunk so i didn't feel TOO bad for the team i left hanging, but this time i was prince and so i'm sure everybody was pretty upset. Anybody have any idea what is going on?

item.title: Game Crashing Today
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Anybody else having problems with the game crashing today? Never happened to me before today. Now 2 times within the last couple hours it crashed at the same moment in the game. Game starts, i open my journal and write my name and class, D1 turns to N1, and then my sword curser turns into that blue spinning loading curser and nothing happens until i close the games window and it says the program isn’t repsonding. First time i was a drunk so i didn’t feel TOO bad for the team i left hanging, but this time i was prince and so i’m sure everybody was pretty upset. Anybody have any idea what is going on?

Read full topic
